# MAMusicHapticsManager

**Class**

A class that reports information about the Music Haptics feature.

## Declaration

```swift
class MAMusicHapticsManager
```

## Overview

Use the [doc://com.apple.mediaaccessibility/documentation/MediaAccessibility/MAMusicHapticsManager/shared] instance of `MAMusicHapticsManager` to check information about the Music Haptics feature so you can respond accordingly in your app. For example, you can check whether Music Haptics is on, get a notification when it turns on or off, or check whether a haptic track is currently playing along with the Now Playing item.

## Getting the shared haptics manager

- **shared**: The shared Music Haptics manager object.

## Checking if Music Haptics is on

- **isActive**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the system setting for Music Haptics is on.
- **activeStatusDidChangeNotification**: A notification that posts when the value of the Music Haptics system setting changes.

## Checking haptic track availability

- **checkHapticTrackAvailabilityForMedia(matchingCode:completionHandler:)**: Checks whether a haptic track is available for the song with the specified International Standard Recording Code (ISRC).

## Observing haptic playback

- **addStatusObserver(_:)**: Adds an observer to monitor the status of haptic playback for the Now Playing song.
- **removeStatusObserver(_:)**: Removes the observer monitoring the status of haptic playback for the Now Playing song.

## Supporting types

- **MAMusicHaptics**: A namespace for Music Haptics symbols.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
